Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium, slightly thickened rim; repair or suspension hole underneath rim; drill hole for sampling in break. Greenish-yellow clay, quite hard. Graffito on lip: ]νυν[.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 401)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.32 fig.3, p.41 no.16)
Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p.56 Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.17)
